name: Shire Blouse
description: A stylish blue blouse designed for comfort and elegance. Perfect for casual outings and can be paired with various accessories for a chic look.

name: Textura Two Ways
description: This green top offers versatility with its two-way design. Whether you prefer a casual or formal look, this top adapts to your style seamlessly.

name: Plain Shirt
description: A yellow shirt that stands out for its simplicity and comfort. Ideal for everyday wear, ensuring you look fresh and trendy.

name: Renown Warp Skirt
description: A black warp skirt known for its unique design and comfort. It provides flexibility in styling, making it a must-have for fashion-forward individuals.

name: Hazy Shirt
description: Embrace elegance with this purple shirt that exudes sophistication. Its soft fabric ensures comfort while its color adds a touch of luxury to your ensemble.

name: Ritzy Pants
description: These orange pants redefine style with their vibrant hue and impeccable fit. Ideal for making a bold fashion statement wherever you go.

name: Ruth Shirt
description: A pink shirt that radiates charm and grace. Its subtle design elements make it a versatile piece suitable for various occasions.

name: Cherry Pants
description: Flaunt your style with these brown pants that offer both comfort and a contemporary look. Pair them with your favorite tops for a complete ensemble.

name: Hollow Vest
description: This cyan-colored vest is all about combining style with comfort. Its design ensures you stay on-trend while feeling at ease throughout the day.

name: Jolly Shirt
description: A gray shirt that captures attention with its design and fit. Whether it's a day at work or a casual outing, this shirt ensures you're always in vogue.
